text: The 2018–19 season of Kabuscorp Sport Clube do Palanca is the club's 17th season in Angolan football and the 12th consecutive season in the Girabola, the top flight league of Angolan football. In 2018–19, the club participated in the Girabola and the Angola Cup. ==FAF Penalty== Kabuscorp forfeited 9 points, for failing to address payment claims by a total 6 individuals, following a 15-day deadline stipulated by the Angolan Football Federation (FAF). The first case includes former player Adawá Mokanga, the second case includes former staff members Afonso Paxe Filho, Dombasi João, Kutama Shabani and former head-coach Romeu Filemón whereas the third case refers to former club physician Dr. Caetano Maria. ==FIFA penalty== The Angolan Football Federation received a letter from FIFA ordering Kabuscorp to be relegated for failing to meet payment claims by former player Rivaldo. Even though the debt has reportedly been paid in full, Kabuscorp failed to pay within the established deadline.
